full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title**: Cogeneration System Maintenance Services
**Reference Number**: cb-382-83128577
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: 5000072681R
**Publication Date**: 01-30-2024
**Tender Closing Date**: 02-26-2024 15:00:00
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Description**: Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking proposals for cogeneration system maintenance services at the Canada Centre for Inland Waters. The contractor will be responsible for maintaining the Caterpillar G3516TA GenSet, including scheduled maintenance, unscheduled repairs, emergency generator rental, and a top-end overhaul.

**Scope of Work**: The scope of work includes:

* Scheduled maintenance of the Caterpillar G3516TA GenSet
* Unscheduled repairs to the GenSet
* Emergency generator rental service
* Top-end overhaul of the GenSet

**Contract Period**: The contract period is from the contract award date to March 31, 2026. There is also an option to renew the contract for two additional one-year periods.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to bidders subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**: This tender is open to bidders from Ontario (except NCR).

**Release of Additional Documents**: The bid solicitation includes a notice package that provides more information on the requirements and criteria for the tender.

**Important Dates**:

* Publication Date: 30-Jan-2024
* Tender Closing Date: 26-Feb-2024 15:00:00

**Contact Information**:

Angelina Garcia, 
Environment and Climate Change Canada, 
Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca, 
(778) 726-1680

**Attachments**:
The bid solicitation is available in English and French. Bidders should
